c74object.name: jit.mo.fieldmask
c74object.digest: Field mask for 3 plane jit.mo streams
c74object.description: Field mask for 3 plane jit.mo streams. Calculates a mask value depending on distance from a defined spatial location. Can be used to perform arbitrary manipulations based on location

attribute.name: location
attribute.description: Location value (default = 0. 0. 0.). Defines the center point of the field.

attribute.name: falloff
attribute.description: Falloff value (default = 0.5). Determines the amount of falloff at the edge of the field, specified as a decimal fraction of the radius

attribute.name: radius
attribute.description: Radius value (default = 0.5). Radius defines the spherical area around the location affected by the field
